channel.title: Credability on Ponte Posterum
channel.description: Recent content in Credability on Ponte Posterum

item.title: Res701 5
item.description: Research 701 ~ Analyzing Academic Articles Todays blog is about reading and understanding one of the academic articles that I chose for the previous blog. We are to answer the following questions around the article. Did the abstract tell you three things I said it should? If not what did it tell you? What seems to be the research question(s) they were trying to answer? What method(s) did they use to answer the question(s)?
